text: They are set to welcome their second baby, after confirming their exciting news in November. But all eyes were on their first child Luna, one, on Wednesday, as Chrissy Teigen, 32, and John Legend, 38, stepped out with their daughter in New York City. The tot looked just adorable as she clutched onto her dad's hand while clad in a gorgeous pink button - up coat and white pom - pom headband. Scroll down for video So sweet!
